Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: 14k gold-plated brass 47mm double demy hunter case with a matching curb chainSkeleton dial with roman numerals17 jewel mechanical movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 4.9 x 4.5 x 1.5 inchesShipping Weight: 0.3 ouncesItem model number: 3536Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description The Charles-Hubert 3536 is a classic pocket watch with a beautifully decorated gold tone case, housing a skeletonized 17-jewel hand wind movement. The front casing on the watch has an observation window so that the time can be read when the case lid is closed. The center of the dial has a mineral crystal that allows you to see the inner workings of the movement. The backside pops open allowing you to see the beautifully decorated inner case and movement. White dial with roman numerals for hour markers. Case: Gold Plated over brass, Ornate Case, 48mm diameter, 18mm thick. Chain: Gold plated watch chain. Warranty: Lifetime factory warranty. Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.
